title: Highest Adequacy of Unemployment Benefits
description: In 2022, Brazil had the highest adequacy of unemployment benefits and active labor market programs, accounting for 27.07% of the total welfare of beneficiary households.

title: Lowest Goods and Services Expense
description: In 2023, Brazil had the lowest goods and services expense as a percentage of total expenses, at 2.41%.

title: Lowest Net National Savings
description: In 2021, Brazil had the lowest adjusted net national savings, with a negative value of -15.90 billion USD.
